file_content.text: Please! You have to get us out of here!
Look, I'm sorry, okay? That's not why we're here. Just... just try to keep your heads down, all right?
Slaves. Whole mess of 'em. I wish we could do something, but this op is strictly smash-and-grab. Pulling them out puts the whole mission in danger.
We can't leave them behind. Do whatever it takes--just get them out of here.
If they want their freedom, let them fight for it.
The battle has already started--if you don't want to be slaves, then find some weapons and join us!
They aren't gonna last long out there....
At least it's a chance! Come on, let's go!
Can't believe the Sith actually choose to live here....
Better keep moving, enemy is everywhere.
